name: Hole in Six
description:
IMPORTANT: If you have trouble moving 1 tile at a time, you might be encountering a bug which depends on the framerate of the game. If you encounter this, consider downloading the Windows version below to get better FPS. Thanks <3

A puzzle game with platformer elements where you play as an adventurous dice going on an expedition down below.

Match the number on the top of the dice to the one in the goal to advance to the next level.



Arrow keys / WASD for movement

Dpad or left stick works too for controller

EVERYTHING (except the font) in this game was made by me.
